A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The first ever star wars movie with BALLS! There were a few things I disliked\, specifically the characterization of Hux compared to Force Awakens\, and all of Benicio Del Toro's character. Overall though\, it will keep you gasping throughout in a very good way. Disney\, ignore the sadfanbois who are upset that Luke is a real human. This is the right movie to make right now!
